description: A customized metal arm that replaces your right arm, it is strange however that this new arm of yours feels very sturdy, but hallow at the same time. Perhaps something is inside...

A fancy metal arm replacement often used by police enforcers, cqc enthusiasts, and some... unsavory individuals. This however only has a single arm and the other one is missing, it is safe to assume that this one is heavily modified and dangerous.
A customized metal arms that completely replaces your arms. Extremely lightweight, sturdy and agile. Still needs constant supply of electricity to use properly.
A fancy metal arm replacement often used by police enforcers, cqc enthusiasts, and some... unsavory individuals.
Your arms had been replaced by a shiny new metallic limb, activate to take out the halberd.
A very fancy arm augmentation that has a compact halberd inside. A simple command from the user will activate the arm and will assemble the weapon at the most efficient way possible.

A medical respiratory aid for those who had problems with tuberculosis, pneumonia, asthma and other lung related disease that is widely sold at major medical institutes before the cataclysm. However, this won't protect you from any hazardous air contaminants.

description: Your body has been implanted with a compact, experimental cryo generator that generates bionic power.  The generator will constantly produce cold aura instead of producing heat to generate power.  It will produce power continuously unless interrupted by the integral disconnect switch.
Emergy safety switch that can be manually used by the user.  Turn it on to halt power production, in the unlikely event that it becomes necessary.

Experimental cryo generator that generates limitless energy. A strange alien device that constantly produce cold aura.  It will produce power continuously unless interrupted by the integral disconnect switch.
A system of power control and safety mechanisms normally built into a Cryo Generator.  Removing it is almost certainly a bad idea.
